ada ude 10.07 ta yedena suba mohothin mese pala laksha 11k ropanaya kere.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ada ude 10.07 ta yedena suba mohothin janadhipathi mandiraye di palayak situwimen aarambha wana mema ruk ropana wadasatahana parisara amathyanshaya sanwidhana karayi.pala laksha 11k situwimata mula di salasum kalath me wana wita ema sankhyawa laksha 20 ikmawiya haki bawa prakasha karana parisara amathyanshaya eya ginas warthawak wanu athayi da wishwasa karayi.

mahinda rajaya janathawata sahana pamanak nowa rata wegawath sanwardhanayak kara genayamin thibuni.mahinda rata bharaganna wita dala deshiya nishpadithayen 103.5% prathishathayak dakwa widesha naya pramanaya ihala gos pawathiyada 2014 wasara aga wana wita kopamana widesha naya gaththada naya prathishathaya 75.5% dakwa adu mattamakata gena thibuni.

ese kele, juda saha benjamin pedeswala senanga mella karana pinisa ya. 13 siyalu ishrayelwarun atharehi siti pujakawaru da lewiwaru da thamange siyalu palathwalin ohu wetha aawo ya. 14 manda, jerobowam saha ohuge puthrayan wisin samindanan wahansege pujaka thanathuren lewiwarun ahak karanu labu nisa, thamange thana bim da thamange urumaya da athhara judatath, jerusalamatath enna owunta sidu wu bawini. 15 thawada, ohu thama sadu girikulu dewalawalatath, elu rupa ha gawa rupa wana dewathawantath pujakayan path karagaththe ya. 16 lewiwarunta pasu, siyalu ishrayel gothrawalin ishrayelge dewi samindanan wahanseta wandumpidum kirimata thaman sith yomu karagath aya thamange piyawarunge dewi samindanan wahanseta puja karana pinisa jerusalamata aawo ya. 17 mese owhu juda rajyaya shakthimath kota salamonge puth rehobowamta thun awuruddak sahaya dunha.

nawa yuwala 2009 warshaye agabhagaye engalanthaye padinchiyata giyaha.

nisala parisaraya 1 aluth kara.

wedi thabimata lak wu ha ema siddhiyen aabadhitha bhawayata lak wu pradeshawasin katunayaka guwan thotupalata pamina, brigediyarwarayata erehiwa nithimaya piyawara ganna lesa baladharin wetha awadharanaya kalaha.
tha්rasthawadaya aarthikaya winasha karana athara deshapalanaya nirpa්rajathantha්rikaranayata lak karayi.
numbaa numbae lokayata -mama mage hinayata
sathi aga nawathama puwatha lesa sandahan wanne ta්ramp janadhipathiwarayage anuga්rahaya matha ohuge birinda ge demawpiyan hata amarikan purawasibhawaya laba dimayi.
kathawa nam rasayi.
namuth ema tharagaya ada dinaye pawathwiya nohaki haki thathwayak athi wiya haki bawa me wana wita aar.premadasa kridanganayen wartha wanawa.
jathika aarthika sabhawe di panibima samagam sahana illa siti bawa saukhya,poshana ha deshiya waidya amathya dosthara rajitha senarathna mahatha pawasanawa.
oo eya sewimata uthsaha darayi.
sandhya kiyana widihata podi kale indala mudal labime wasanawak ayata thiyenawa.
(kolambaa, lankapuwath) –aasiyanu dal pandu shuratha tharangawaliye shurathawaya dina ganimata shri lanka kandayama eeye (09) samath wiya.
eksath jathika pakshaye prathisanwidhanaya pilibandawa ruwan wijayawardhana amathyawarayage mulikathwayen pihitawu kamitu warthawa apa wetha labi thibe.
duppath drawida wasiyange daruwanta pana paseka dama awiya athata deddi nayakayange daruwan sura sapa windimin mana adhyapanayak labuweya.

giribawa pradeshaye niwasaka thaniwa siti 17 hawiridi pasal sisuwiyak dushanaya kota sahasika lesa mara damu bawata athadanguwata gath harshana saman kumarage mawa wisin ghathanayata lakwu sisuwiyage demawpiyan wetha lipiyak liya thibenawa.
il poda siyalu wihara, pansal dewala ha niwasayanhi pahan dalwima medina sawasa sidukere.
ithin menna mekayi mage adahasa.
dan widiyo chat sama dinakama gana pawathina wisi dahasak samanga amuththan, ese soya ganimata sithganna yanne naha kirimata pahasu wanu — nawa widiyo chat samaga gahanu.
nathnam sisil jalaya ho unu jalaya panaya kirimen wadi saukhyamaya wasi labe yayi sithima nam sathyayak nowe.

ehi ‘mahidathera hacha bhadasala therahacha, itikatherahacha uthitherahacha’ (13 wana pela) yanuwen sandahan kara aththe shri lankawata bududahama handunwa dun mahinda, bhaddasala, ittiya, uththiya yana therawarun pilibanda bawa nisakaya.

“apa aathmayen shariraye kriya nasannata” (roma 8:13) saha shuddhathmayanan wahansege maga penwima thulin dewiyan wahanse hada samaga nisi sabandathawayakata athulwimata karyayakshama nowuwoth, apage kriyawan aakalpa saha abhiprayan apage manshayepalanaya yatathata eemata hakiyawak thibe.
ee anuwa heta yana sankalpaya manomulika nisa, anagathaye pawathina nisa balagiri yakshaya hamadama aapasu hari yamata siduwe.
siripa wandindata ena samanalunta siripa maluwata ennata pin madibawa pene.
meyin biyata path anikuth sewakayan warjanaya athahara dama nawatha sewayata wartha karana lada athara, ema wada warjanaya asarthaka ekak bawata pathwiya.
elesama pingan sedime karyaya garu sewayak nowa ee wenuwen sahena pamana watupak gewa atha.
ithirikirime ginuma piyawa atha.
hambantheata waraya giwisuma sambandhawa adhikaranayata asathya prakasha idiripath kirima hethuwen mese samawa ayadimata siduwana bawa agamathiwaraya pawasayi.
so........yi ne kiyala.
manasika asahanaya - asathuta - manasika pasugamithwaya wani thaththwa suwapath kirimata menma wiwidha rogabadha sandaha manasika prathikarayak lesa da me abhyasaya bhawitha kala hakiya.

dan owun tharamak durata hondin jiwath wenawa.
widesha rakiya ha deshiya shrama welendapola awashyatha athara samabarathawayak athi kirima sandaha prathipaththin sakas kirimata rajaya salasum karanawa.
ithamath ranakami lesa satan wudunu hamudawe ihala niladharin sewa diguwak laba nodi hamudawen eliyata ada damanawa.
ow, kanna barinam mewaye ata suddakarala palakaranna thiyagamu.
